name: Flare of Long Night Flint
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  The insignia of the Lightkeepers is a nightingale holding a burning wick inits beak.  It is said that in the past, the nightingale insignia belonged to a renownednoble house in the northern kingdom. In the shadow untouched by light, a boy,who would become a legendary thief, carved his first raven insignia with hisfriend in imitatation of the nightingale.  But that was many years ago. Nowadays, the raven insignia can be seeneverywhere, but the nightingale that the raven once looked up to still dwellson its tower, lamenting the winter city to the light.
